HOME.PRE_START: Avant de continuer, vous devez cliquer sur le bouton **{{button}}**.
HOME.DESCRIPTION:
Commencez à configurer Filo en sélectionnant la catégorie de modules que vous souhaitez configurer et sélectionnez ensuite le module avec lequel vous souhaitez opérer.

**Vous avez besoin d'un guide de référence? Ne vous inquiétez pas !**
En **[cliquant ici]({{url}})**, vous serez redirigé vers le wiki de Filo, qui contient des informations sur la façon dont configurer n'importe quoi.

**Trop compliqué ?**
**[Contactez-nous]({{url2}})** si vous avez des questions ou si vous avez besoin d'éclaircissements supplémentaires.

ADMINISTRATION.LABEL: Modules d'Administration
ADMINISTRATION.DESCRIPTION: Modules pour vous aider dans l'administration de votre serveur.

COMMUNITY.LABEL: Modules communautaires
COMMUNITY.DESCRIPTION: Des modules pour vous aider à améliorer l'expérience dans votre communauté.

MODERATION.LABEL: Modules de modération
MODERATION.DESCRIPTION: Modules pour vous aider à modérer votre serveur.

HOME.TITLE: Menu de configuration de Filo

LOADING_DATA: Veuillez patienter pendant le chargement des données nécessaires.

MODULES.SELECT_A_MODULE: Vous devez sélectionner le module de la catégorie **{{module}}** que vous souhaitez configurer.
MODULES.SELECT_A_SUBMODULE: You must select the submodule from the **{{module}}** module that you want to configure.
MODULES.SELECT_THE_ACTION: Vous devez sélectionner l'action que vous souhaitez effectuer sur le module.
MODULES.MODULE_ENABLED_OR_DISABLED: Le module **{{module}}** a été {{action}} avec succès.
MODULES.RESET_REQUEST_WARNING: Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir réinitialiser le module **{{module}}** ? Cette action ne peut être annulée !
MODULES.MODULE_RESET: Le module **{{module}}** a été réinitialisé avec succès.
MODULES.SELECT_A_CHANNEL: Vous devez sélectionner le salon que vous souhaitez régler.
MODULES.SELECT_AT_LEAST_ONE_CHANNEL: Vous devez sélectionner au moins un salon.
MODULES.SELECT_A_ROLE: Vous devez sélectionner le rôle que vous souhaitez régler.
MODULES.SELECT_AT_LEAST_ONE_ROLE: Vous devez sélectionner au moins un rôle.
MODULES.CHANNEL_SET: You have successfully set the **[#{{channel.name}}]({{url}})** channel for the **{{module}}** module.

DM_STATUS.LABEL: Toggle the status of DMs
DM_STATUS.DESCRIPTION: Change the status of notifications by DM.
DM_STATUS.DM_STATUS_TOGGLED: You have successfully **{{action}}** the DM notifications for the **{{module}}** module.

ADD.LABEL: Add {{type}}
ADD.DESCRIPTION: Add {{type}} to the module's exception list.
ADD.COMPLETED: You have successfully added the {{value}} {{type}} to the module's exception list.
ADD.COMPLETED_ALTERNATIVE: You have successfully added **{{number}}** {{type}} to the module's exception list.

SET.LABEL: Set the {{type}}
SET.DESCRIPTION: Set the {{type}} list to the module's exception list.
SET.COMPLETED: You have successfully set the {{value}} {{type}} to the module's exception list.
SET.COMPLETED_ALTERNATIVE: You have successfully set **{{number}}** {{type}} to the module's exception list.

REMOVE.LABEL: Remove {{type}}
REMOVE.DESCRIPTION: Remove {{type}} to the module's exception list.
REMOVE.COMPLETED: You have successfully removed the {{value}} {{type}} to the module's exception list.
REMOVE.COMPLETED_ALTERNATIVE: You have successfully removed **{{number}}** {{type}} to the module's exception list.
REMOVE.NO_DATA_TO_REMOVE: There are no {{value}} available to remove from the module's exception list.

COMMANDS.LABEL: Commandes
COMMANDS.DESCRIPTION: Modifiez le comportement des commandes de Filo.

CONFIGURE.SELECT_THE_COMMANDS: Vous devez sélectionner les commandes que vous souhaitez {{action}}.
CONFIGURE.SELECT_THE_CATEGORIES: Vous devez sélectionner les catégories que vous souhaitez {{action}}.

DISABLE_COMMANDS.LABEL: Désactiver les commandes
DISABLE_COMMANDS.NO_COMMANDS_TO_DISABLE: Toutes les commandes disponibles ont été désactivées.
DISABLE_COMMANDS.COMMANDS_DISABLED: Vous avez désactivé **{{commands}}** commandes avec succès.

ENABLE_COMMANDS.LABEL: Activer les commandes
ENABLE_COMMANDS.NO_COMMANDS_TO_ENABLE: Toutes les commandes disponibles sont actuellement activées.
ENABLE_COMMANDS.COMMANDS_ENABLED: Vous avez activé les commandes **{{commands}}** avec succès.

DISABLE_CATEGORIES.LABEL: Désactiver les catégories
DISABLE_CATEGORIES.NO_CATEGORIES_TO_DISABLE: Toutes les catégories disponibles ont été désactivées.
DISABLE_CATEGORIES.CATEGORIES_DISABLED: Vous avez désactivé **{{categories}}** catégories avec succès.

ENABLE_CATEGORIES.LABEL: Activer les catégories
ENABLE_CATEGORIES.NO_CATEGORIES_TO_ENABLE: Toutes les catégories disponibles sont actuellement activées.
ENABLE_CATEGORIES.CATEGORIES_ENABLED: Vous avez activé **{{categories}}** catégories avec succès.

LANGUAGE.LABEL: Langue
LANGUAGE.DESCRIPTION: Changez la langue de Filo sur ce serveur.
LANGUAGE.SELECT_A_LANGUAGE: Vous devez sélectionner la langue que vous souhaitez définir.
LANGUAGE.LANGUAGE_SET: You have set the **{{language}}** language successfully.

REPORTS.LABEL: Reports
REPORTS.DESCRIPTION: Provide reporting tools to your server members.

SUBMODULES_SELECTOR.MEMBERS: Modifier le comportement du module de signalement des membres.
SUBMODULES_SELECTOR.MESSAGES: Change the behavior of the message reporting module.

REPORTS_CHANNEL.LABEL: Set the reports channel
REPORTS_CHANNEL.DESCRIPTION: Set where you want the reports to be sent.

IGNORED_ROLE.LABEL: Set the ignored role
IGNORED_ROLE.DESCRIPTION: Set a role whose members can't send reports.
IGNORED_ROLE.IGNORED_ROLE_SET: You have set the **{{role.mention}}** ({{role.id}}) role as the ignored role successfully.

TOGGLE_DELETE_REVIEWED_REPORTS.LABEL: Toggle the deletion of reviewed reports
TOGGLE_DELETE_REVIEWED_REPORTS.DESCRIPTION: Change the status of the deletion of reviewed reports.
TOGGLE_DELETE_REVIEWED_REPORTS.DELETE_REVIEWED_REPORTS_TOGGLED: You have successfully **{{action}}** the deletion of reviewed reports.

ADD.LABEL: Add notification roles
ADD.DESCRIPTION: Add roles that will be notified when a report is sent.
ADD.COMPLETED: You have added the **{{role.mention}}** ({{role.id}}) role as a notification role successfully.
ADD.COMPLETED_ALTERNATIVE: You have added **{{number}}** roles as notification roles successfully.

SET.LABEL: Set the notification roles
SET.DESCRIPTION: Set the roles that will be notified when a report is sent.
SET.COMPLETED: You have set the **{{role.mention}}** ({{role.id}}) role as the notification role successfully.
SET.COMPLETED_ALTERNATIVE: You have set **{{number}}** roles as the notification roles successfully.

REMOVE.LABEL: Remove notification roles
REMOVE.DESCRIPTION: Remove roles that will be notified when a report is sent.
REMOVE.COMPLETED: You have removed the **{{role.mention}}** ({{role.id}}) role as a notification role successfully.
REMOVE.COMPLETED_ALTERNATIVE: You have removed **{{number}}** roles as notification roles successfully.
REMOVE.NO_DATA_TO_REMOVE: There are no notification roles available to remove.

REASON.LABEL: Configure the reason parameters
REASON.DESCRIPTION: Change the behavior of the reason field of the reports.

SET_MIN_LENGTH_OF_MEMBER_REASON.LABEL: Set the minimum length of member reason
SET_MIN_LENGTH_OF_MEMBER_REASON.DESCRIPTION: Set the minimum length of the reason of the member reports.
SET_MIN_LENGTH_OF_MEMBER_REASON.COMPLETED: You have successfully set the minimum length of the members reason to **{{number}}** characters.

SET_MAX_LENGTH_OF_MEMBER_REASON.LABEL: Set the maximum length of member reason
SET_MAX_LENGTH_OF_MEMBER_REASON.DESCRIPTION: Set the maximum length of the reason of the member reports.
SET_MAX_LENGTH_OF_MEMBER_REASON.COMPLETED: You have successfully set the maximum length of the members reason to **{{number}}** characters.

CLEAN_MARKDOWN_OF_MEMBER_REASON.LABEL: Toggle the cleaning of the markdown of member reason
CLEAN_MARKDOWN_OF_MEMBER_REASON.DESCRIPTION: Change the status of the cleaning of the markdown of the reason of the member reports.
CLEAN_MARKDOWN_OF_MEMBER_REASON.COMPLETED: You have successfully **{{action}}** the cleaning of the markdown of the members reason.

SET_MIN_LENGTH_OF_REVIEWER_REASON.LABEL: Set the minimum length of reviewer reason
SET_MIN_LENGTH_OF_REVIEWER_REASON.DESCRIPTION: Set the minimum length of the reason of the reviewer reports.
SET_MIN_LENGTH_OF_REVIEWER_REASON.COMPLETED: You have successfully set the minimum length of the reviewers reason to **{{number}}** characters.

SET_MAX_LENGTH_OF_REVIEWER_REASON.LABEL: Set the maximum length of reviewer reason
SET_MAX_LENGTH_OF_REVIEWER_REASON.DESCRIPTION: Set the maximum length of the reason of the reviewer reports.
SET_MAX_LENGTH_OF_REVIEWER_REASON.COMPLETED: You have successfully set the maximum length of the reviewers reason to **{{number}}** characters.

CLEAN_MARKDOWN_OF_REVIEWER_REASON.LABEL: Toggle the cleaning of the markdown of reviewer reason
CLEAN_MARKDOWN_OF_REVIEWER_REASON.DESCRIPTION: Change the status of the cleaning of the markdown of the reason of the reviewer reports.
CLEAN_MARKDOWN_OF_REVIEWER_REASON.COMPLETED: You have successfully **{{action}}** the cleaning of the markdown of the reviewers reason.

EVIDENCES.LABEL: Configure the evidences parameters
EVIDENCES.DESCRIPTION: Change the behavior of the evidences field of the reports.

SET_MIN_COUNT.LABEL: Set the minimum count of evidences
SET_MIN_COUNT.DESCRIPTION: Set the minimum count of evidences that a report must have.
SET_MIN_COUNT.COMPLETED: You have successfully set the minimum count of evidences to **{{number}}**.
